video.title: Freezing
video.synopsis: In a future world at war with aliens, a promising young military student and his genetically altered classmate team up as a powerful fighting force.

episodes.synopsis: Satellizer el Bridget is the top-ranked Pandora at the West Genetics academy, but her status is jeopardized by a strange encounter with Kazuya Aoi.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Kazuya’s attempt to apologize to Satellizer is interrupted by the arrival of Ganessa, who appears eager for a rematch.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Kazuya unleashes his true powers when he gets caught up in a catfight between Satellizer and a cold-hearted classmate who collects Limiters.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Satellizer is challenged to a duel by the powerful “Protector of Order,” she must race to find a Limiter -- or face her latest foe alone.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: En route to Satellizer’s room for a celebration of their new union, Kazuya is attacked by three sadistic Pandoras, and his powers mysteriously vanish.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A manipulative upperclassman uses Rana and Satellizer’s mutual affection for Kazuya to lure the two powerful Pandoras into a fight to the death.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Realizing they’ve been tricked, Rana and Satellizer join forces in an attempt to turn the tables on their attackers.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: While Kazuya decides between taking Rana or Satellizer to the big dance, the untouchable queen enters a Pandora beauty pageant.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Kazuya meets a Pandora who carries the essence of his dead sister, and East Genetics is attacked by four Novas with unprecedented abilities.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Satellizer confronts Kazuya over his interest in becoming her Limiter, and the Nova turn fallen Pandoras into an unstoppable attack force.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: As the enslaved Nova-Pandora hybrids approach the Ravensborne Nucleochede, Satellizer and her comrades attempt to protect the source of their power.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: In the heat of battle, Satellizer pushes her powers to unnatural levels, putting her at risk of being possessed by the Nova.
episodes.title: Episode 12
